text: Two frogs lived in a beautiful swamp, but summer came and it dried up, so they left it to look for another with water. Along the way they found a deep well. When one saw it, the frog said to the other, "Friend, let's both go down to the well". "But if the water from this well is also drunk", replied the companion, "how do you think we will get up then?" When you try to take action, first analyze the consequences.
title: Las ranas y el pantano seco
author: nan Esopo
